text:
[Verse]
Wishing on a star tonight
Dreams take flight in the sky
Hopes are high like a kite
Shooting past clouds we fly

[Verse 2]
Counting stars one by one
Nighttime feels like the sun
Moments bright days begun
In this dream we all run

[Chorus]
Stars that shine smiles so wide
In the dark they abide
Heartbeats fast can’t decide
Follow dreams never hide

[Verse 3]
Sky is full dreams won’t break
Every breath hearts awake
Steps we take real or fake
In this night paths we make

[Bridge]
Bright like lights in the city
Dreams that dance oh so pretty
Never stop hearts so witty
Counting stars such a ditty

[Chorus]
Stars that shine smiles so wide
In the dark they abide
Heartbeats fast can’t decide
Follow dreams never hide
title: Counting Stars
